title: My account got hacked
body: My main account just got recently hacked today by a unknown person the name of the acc is ChaseTheWind I have not told anybody my password they even changed my password to something else and my email detail tnphan0140203@gmail.com i would hope that ill get my acc back my "old'password is yasuozed111 please help me Riot. Im in oce

replies.body: No worries just yet, hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the "I need help recovering my account" option. After answering those questions, they'll be able to help you get back into your account!
I've changed my password and so far I haven't been hacked again. I too have fallen victim of the "free rp" scam. Don't worry, they're doing their best to help everyone.
